abilities.description: Crocodile uses his sand powers to drain the moisture from Mr. 3's body, dehydrating him as punishment for his failure.

keyMoments.title: Crocodile Dehydrates Mr. 3
keyMoments.description: Crocodile demonstrates the lethal nature of his Devil Fruit by draining the moisture from Mr. 3's body.

weaknesses.description: Water can solidify sand and nullify Crocodile's intangibility
